info.modalContent:
Scheduled Reports automatically generate your Google Ads reports on a recurring basis, with slides populated with up-to-date data and analyzed by Narrative Layer AI.

With scheduled reports, you can:
• Automatically generate reports daily, weekly, or monthly
• Get fresh data for the selected period with each generation
• Benefit from AI-powered analysis of performance trends and insights
• Review reports before sending them to clients (sending remains manual)
• Use templates as the foundation for automated reports
• Track execution history and success rates

Scheduled reports save you time by automating data collection and analysis, while keeping you in control of client communications.
